column1: Little Goat Diner////Absolutely amazing place. To be honest
column2: the wait at 10:45am on a Sunday morning was over an hour
column4: or else you'll leave mad. They have an excellent system where you can put your name down and they will text you when your table is ready. There is even a little link in the text that will say home many parties are ahead of you. Excellent planning strategy
column5: especially since La Columbe coffee is two blocks down the street. Grab a coffee and wait it out since there's no room to wait inside.
